overview:
41 years old Co-Founder and Chief Strategic Officer at www.MYMobileSecurity.com. Founder and CEO at www.MYSecurityCenter.com

Danish entrepreneur with a strong management background gained from over 15 years in the I.T Consumer & Security industry.

2003 CEO and Founder of MYSecurityCenter.

1997 - 2003 Regional Vice President at Computer Associates (CA). Headed up the Scandinavian Security Software Channel Division and led the OEM Security Software team on a Pan-European level to massive success and huge revenue streams for CA in a totally new business arrear.

1991 – 1997 Regional Sales Director at Corel Corporation (Corel Draw and WordPerfect). Took the Nordic market from nothing to the best performing region in the world in less than 4 years.

Was awarded “Sales Exec of the year, 1995” among more than 1500 sales execs worldwide.

Janus was also the sole catalyst in the amazing success MSC have had over the years, having more than 15.000.000 installations, 3.000.000 registered users and approx 500.000 paying customers.

In 2006 MYSecurityCenter was awarded “EMEA partner of the year” by CA, a fortune 500 American software company with more than 15.000 employees and a market cap of approx 4 billion USD. Still today MSC is the only partner / distributor or customer in the Nordics to which have achieved this award!
